text: Majin Buu is a fictional character from the manga Dragon Ball and anime Dragon Ball Z. He also appears in Dragon Ball GT and Dragon Ball Super. ==Biography== Buu is an ancient being sealed by Babidi. He wants to destroy the world and transform people into candy. ==Portrayals== Majin Buu has been voiced by Josh Martin for the Funimation dub. Category:Anime characters Category:Dragon Ball characters Category:Fictional demons and devils Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1994
title: Majin Buu
